categories: Category:Military ranks of the Sun Guard

nodes.text: Stellar Legionnaire was the initiate-level rank of the Thyrsus Sun Guard. Legionnaires served for a provisional term of one year, in which time they could be expelled for breaches of Sun Guard etiquette. Upon finishing their term, they were promoted to Stellar Tribune.
In creating the ranks of the Sun Guard for Galaxy at War, Daniel Wallace chose names reminiscent of those of the Roman Empire.
